akn:content.akn:p:
§ 5012. Disposition of property The Secretary shall dispose of any United States property held by the International North Pacific Fisheries Commission on the date of its termination in a manner that would further the purposes of this chapter. (Pub. L. 102–567, title VIII, § 813, Oct. 29, 1992, 106 Stat. 4316; Pub. L. 102–587, title VIII, § 8013, Nov. 4, 1992, 106 Stat. 5106; Pub. L. 106–562, title III, § 304(a), Dec. 23, 2000, 114 Stat. 2806.)
Editorial Notes Codification Title VIII of Pub. L. 102–567 and Pub. L. 102–587 enacted identical sections. Title VIII of Pub. L. 102–587 was repealed by Pub. L. 106–562.
